posts.post_content:
Offered here are two white silks with Old Mill Ad Backs. One is HOF Chief Bender with bright Blue printing in Ex or above condition with note to the factory fold. The second white silk is Reulbach Cubs with Red Printing. This one is also in EX or above condition. The final is a nice Wiltse colored silk with a tad of fraying but a nice and difficult color to find. Feel free to check out our tribute website on silks. [url]www.s74silk.com[/url].

Bender 239.00
Reulback 105.00 sold
Wiltse        40.00 sold
